product_name: Blue Orange Spot It! Gone Camping Card Game
long_description: Add laughter to your lantern-lit evenings in camp with the Spot it! Gone Camping card game. This little tin offers everything needed for endlessly fun in-camp games. Designed for 2 to 8 players, ages 7 to adult; improves visual perception, focus and reaction time. Includes 55 cards and illustrated rules; one game takes about 15 minutes to complete, so no one gets bored.
short_description: Add laughter to your lantern-lit evenings in camp with the Spot it! Gone Camping card game. This little tin offers everything needed for endlessly fun in-camp games.
